src:
Man steals gaming devices from Gulf Coast Town Center Target store
05 Nov 2019, 16:45 by WFTX Digital Team



LEE COUNTY, Fla. — Southwest Florida Crime Stoppers is asking for the public's help identifying a man accused of stealing from Gulf Coast Town Center Target.
The suspect stole 4 Nintendo Switch lite gaming devices totaling in $800.00.
If you have any information, please call SWFL Crime Stoppers.
